oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Pulsebeat Radio Show: Tanya Tucker - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is of Kim Spangler (host) dictating the Pulsebeat section of the Voice of the Heartland Radio Show. The episode interviews Tanya Tucker (musician). The episode was set to air for the week of July 17, 1988. The episode is part 2 of 2.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Kim Spangler; Tanya Tucker
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:01) Kim Spangler introduces the upcoming Tanya Tucker Pulsebeat show -- (00:42) Call on Me (Tanya Tucker) -- (03:47) Spangler introduces the commercial break -- (04:04) Spangler introduces Tucker and asks how Tucker had changed from her youth -- (06:10) If it Don't Come Easy (Tanya Tucker) -- (09:23) Spangler asks Tucker about her feelings on 'Delta Dawn' -- (10:30) Delta Dawn (Tanya Tucker) -- (13:13) Spangler introduces the commercial break -- (13:31) Spangler asks Tucker to make a song request -- (13:57) Miami Miami (Keith Whitley) -- (17:12) Spangler asks Tucker about how she feels about working with Jerry Crutchfield -- (18:52) Spangler introduces the commercial break -- (19:06) I Won't Take Less Than Your Love (Tanya Tucker, Paul Overstreet and Paul Davis) -- (22:37) Spangler inquires about the production of "I Won't Take Less Than Your Love" -- (23:36) Unidentified tune [featuring Kim Spangler outro discussion] ([Unidentified])
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Spangler, Kim; Tucker, Tanya;
